mapper.select: select t.id "id", t.productID "productid", t.specColor "speccolor", t.specSize "specsize", t.specStock "specstock", t.specPrice "specprice", t.specStatus "specstatus" from t_spec t where 1=1 order by specsize limit #{offset},#{pageSize}
select count(*) from t_spec t where 1=1
select * from t_spec t where 1=1 and productID=#{productID} and specStatus=#{specStatus}
mapper.insert: insert into t_spec ( id ,productID ,specColor ,specSize ,specStock ,specPrice ,specStatus ) values ( id ,#{productID} ,#{specColor} ,#{specSize} ,#{specStock} ,#{specPrice} ,#{specStatus} )
mapper.update: update t_spec set id=#{id} ,productID=#{productID} ,specColor=#{specColor} ,specSize=#{specSize} ,specStock=#{specStock} ,specPrice=#{specPrice} ,specStatus=#{specStatus} where 1=1 and id=#{id}
mapper.select: select t.id "id", t.productID "productid", t.specColor "speccolor", t.specSize "specsize", t.specStock "specstock", t.specPrice "specprice", t.specStatus "specstatus" from t_spec t where 1=1 and id=#{id}
select * from t_spec t where 1=1 and id=#{id}
mapper.delete: delete from t_spec where 1=1 and id=#{id}
